nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a bartender served Luke Skywalker and a bounty hunter sixteen mugs of Corellian whiskey. Skywalker was extracting information from the bounty hunter by getting him drunk while using the Force to nullify the alcohol in his system. After asking for directions of Margess Base, the bartender hoped that Skywalker was not intending to drive there after imbibing so much alcohol. Skywalker used a mind trick to make the bartender forget.
